  • Constructor Details

    • Customer

      public Customer(String username, String password, String userType, String name, String surname, String email, String cellNumber, Location loc)
      Constructs a new Customer object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the customer
      password - the password of the customer
      userType - the type of user (e.g., customer)
      name - the name of the customer
      surname - the surname of the customer
      email - the email address of the customer
      cellNumber - the cell phone number of the customer
      loc - the location of the customer
